title: A Healing Touch Chiropractic Center Ribbon Cutting Ceremony Postponed - City of Columbia, Columbia SC
author: Ryen Cohen
cleaned_text: Due to inclement weather, the ribbon cutting ceremony for A Healing Touch Chiropractic Center, which was scheduled for Saturday, October 1, 2022 at 5 p.m. has been canceled and will be held at a later date. An updated media advisory will be distributed once the event has been rescheduled.
